title: How War and a Shortage of Men Has Shattered Ukraine’s Dating Scene
content: While the pursuit of love might seem secondary to dealing with the horrors and privations of the war, many Ukrainians say they need romantic relationships to help them cope.
summary: While the pursuit of love might seem secondary to dealing with the horrors and privations of the war, many Ukrainians say they need romantic relationships to help them cope.

title: Hamas May Emerge Battered, but Not Beaten, From Israel’s Latest Blows
